item.title: [PI] Voting
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“Nonamee, post:5, topic:413562”][quote author=I am beast link=topic=515062.msg3739777#msg3739777 date=1315254894]
It’s possible, but you have to do a lot more coding then you might think. Just make separate buttons for each of the links, that would be the easiest way. Then go server sided, and make your checkVote make it check the 2-3 sites, to see if they have voted.
[/quote]

I have no previous PHP experience. But I made my checkVote check the vote.php page. ex. http://myforums.org/vote.php

Based on the button that says vote now, I think I can copy it and make new buttons though.[/quote]

This is a bad idea IMO, this means all they have to do is open the page, then get the reward. If you make it check the RL site, then they HAVE to vote.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Voting
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

I am beast:

It’s possible, but you have to do a lot more coding then you might think. Just make separate buttons for each of the links, that would be the easiest way. Then go server sided, and make your checkVote make it check the 2-3 sites, to see if they have voted.

I have no previous PHP experience. But I made my checkVote check the vote.php page. ex. http://myforums.org/vote.php

Based on the button that says vote now, I think I can copy it and make new buttons though.

Read full topic
